title: Philip Stein - Our Technology
description:
Discover how Natural Frequency Technology is used in all Philip Stein products to help wearers Look, Feel and Live at their best.  

Visit to find out more about watches and bracelets designed to help wearers feel more focused and less stressed and sleep bracelets created to help wearers sleep better and wake up feeling more refreshed.

asset.author: Philip Stein
asset.description:
Discover how Natural Frequency Technology is used in all Philip Stein products to help wearers Look, Feel and Live at their best.  

Visit http://philipstein.com to find out more about watches and bracelets designed to help wearers feel more focused and less stressed and sleep bracelets created to help wearers sleep better and wake up feeling more refreshed.

transcripts: since 2003 philip stein has created timepieces and accessories that can help whereas look and feel at their best from watches and bracelets that were designed to help whereas feel more focused and less stressed to sleep bracelets that were created to help where a sleep better and wake up feeling more refreshed but how does it work to explain we need to go back in the nineteen twenties German scientists hands burger recorded the first electrical frequencies transmitted by the brain when in a state of calm and relaxation which he called alpha waves fast forward to $MONTH 1952 another German scientists Winfrey daughter human discovered that our planet had a pulse measurable natural frequencies that surrounded life on Earth which he called schumann resonance further research by Schumann revealed the children resonance and alpha waves the frequencies emitted from the human brain when in a state of calm and relaxation were identical the brains frequencies which are known to control our performance stress anxiety and creativity attuned into the pulse of the earth meaning the pulse of the earth was also the pulse of life as we know it what does this mean for human life in the nineteen sixties scientist worker Weaver conducted experiments which revealed that exposure to the Earths natural frequencies could improve overall health and well-being today each philip stein product houses a natural frequency technology disk that acts like an antenna harnessing and channeling the natural frequencies that are beneficial to the human body each disc is tuned to meet a particular need watches and bracelets are designed to channel the frequencies that can help whereas feel more focused and less stress and sleep bracelets are designed to channel the frequencies that can help whereas sleep better and wake up feeling more refreshed at philip stein we are constantly looking for ways to use our natural frequency technology help the world look feel and live in tune
